c:capability.name: Recording
c:capability.c:description: Base attributes and methods for recordings

c:attribute.name: name
c:attribute.description: Human readable name for the device

c:attribute.name: accountid
c:attribute.description: The place that the recording is associated with.

c:attribute.name: placeid
c:attribute.description: The place that the recording is associated with.

c:attribute.name: cameraid
c:attribute.description: The camera that the recording is associated with.

c:attribute.name: personid
c:attribute.description: The person that the recording is associated with.

c:attribute.name: timestamp
c:attribute.description: A timestamp identifying when the recording was made.

c:attribute.name: width
c:attribute.description: The width of the recording in pixels.

c:attribute.name: height
c:attribute.description: The height of the recording in pixels.

c:attribute.name: bandwidth
c:attribute.description: The target bandwidth of the video in bps.

c:attribute.name: framerate
c:attribute.description: The frame rate of the video in fps.

c:attribute.name: precapture
c:attribute.description: The precapture time in seconds, or 0 if no precaptured video is present.

c:attribute.name: type
c:attribute.description: The recording type. STREAM indicates a live streaming session.

c:attribute.name: duration
c:attribute.description: The duration of the recording in seconds

c:attribute.name: size
c:attribute.description: The side of the recording in bytes.

c:attribute.name: deleted
c:attribute.description: If true then the recording has been scheduled for deletion.

c:attribute.name: deleteTime
c:attribute.description: If the recording has been scheduled for deletion then this represents the time at which the recording will be permanently removed.

c:attribute.name: completed
c:attribute.description: If the recording has been completed.

c:method.name: View
c:method.description: Used to retrieve URLs that can be used for viewing this recording.

c:return.name: hls
c:return.description: A URL that can be used to stream video using the HLS protocol.

c:return.name: dash
c:return.description: This parameter was deprecated in 2018.07. A URL that can be used to stream video using the MPEG-DASH protocol.

c:return.name: preview
c:return.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve a preview image for the recording.

c:return.name: expiration
c:return.description: A UTC timestamp indicating when the URLs returned are no longer valid.

c:method.name: Download
c:method.description: Used to retrieve URLs that can be used for viewing this recording.

c:return.name: mp4
c:return.description: A URL that can be used to download an MP4 formatted version of the recording..

c:return.name: preview
c:return.description: A URL that can be used to download a JPG preview image of the recording.

c:return.name: expiration
c:return.description: A UTC timestamp indicating when the URLs returned are no longer valid.

c:return.name: mp4SizeEstimate
c:return.description: An estimate of the size of the mp4 file.

c:method.name: Resurrect
c:method.description: Deprecated since 2018.07: Resurrects this recording if possible.
